entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:06 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 06:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %

Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Snow with ice pellets this afternoon and with freezing rain late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain changing to rain this evening then to flurries overnight. Fog patches late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
